mapper.insert: insert into share_bill(user_id, title, type, description, address, time, cur_people, max_people, price, latitude, longitude, geohash) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{type}, #{description}, #{address}, #{time}, #{curPeople}, #{maxPeople}, #{price}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{geohash})
mapper.select: select bill_id, user_id, type, description, address, time, cur_people, max_people, price, longitude, latitude, geohash from share_bill where user_id = #{userId}
